name: INTERVENTION-K: Intro Chapter
description:
A Classic Point&Click Adventure.

Igor is a normal guy who suddenly quit his job, breaks up with his girlfriend and completely disappears. None of his friends could find him.

 You follow the story from his point of view when he recovers conscience and finds himself on a remote tropical island trying to meditate, so he could remember and understand what happened to him, but things don't go as expected and tense situations start to escalate...

Talk to people, explore the hotel and the island, solve puzzles and more!

This is the introduction chapter, featuring the full intro and some Puzzles and Events that take place on the first day in the island. Depending on game acceptance I will create each day as a separate chapter and/or a full single game containing the whole story involving Igor, those tourists, the island, his friends and the Great Secret that is behind all those events that could be related to police and secret cults activities... Soon!
